DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled interventional study design determine whether breast cancer surgical patient receive presurgical massage therapy perform licensed massage therapist decreased average anxiety level compare control group breast cancer surgical patient receive massage therapy .
DOC.criteria: Male female Must speak English Able give consent 18 year age old Undergoing first procedure outpatient breast/axillary surgery Vassar Brothers Medical Center Anxiolytics antidepressant medication previous 24 hour Any condition would prohibit receiving massage IV medication prior presurgical hold VAS assessment
